item.title: 特拉菲古拉称铝业涨势 "已结束"，供应回升
item.description: 据最大的金属贸易商之一 Trafigura 集团的分析师称，随着市场供应的恢复和高利率继续抑制制造业需求，铝价在未来六个月内至少会下跌 6%。【原文：Aluminum prices should decline by at least 6% over the next six months as supply returns to the market and high interest rates continue to crimp manufacturing demand, according to an analyst from Trafigura Group, one of the biggest traders of the metal.】

item.title: CPI 显示通胀压力缓解，日元对美元汇率大涨
item.description: 在美国消费者物价增长读数显示通胀压力减弱后，日元兑美元汇率跳升超过 1%。【原文：The yen jumped more than 1% against the dollar after a reading of US consumer price growth showed softening inflation pressure.】

item.title: 德国商业银行称俄罗斯法律案件可能造成 "重大 "打击
item.description: 德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）表示，它在俄罗斯面临着各种法律案件，这些案件造成了业务风险。【原文：Commerzbank AG said it’s facing various legal cases in Russia that have created a business risk.】

item.title: 交易员认为通胀缓解有助于美联储减息，国债飙升
item.description: 数据显示，衡量美国通胀的一项指标在 4 月份出现了六个月来的首次降温，之后国债反弹，使 10 年期国债收益率达到一个多月来的最低点。【原文：Treasuries rallied, sending 10-year yields to the lowest in more than a month, after data showed a gauge of US inflation cooled in April for the first time in six months.】

item.title: 淡水河谷印尼公司获得特别采矿许可证，有效期延长至 2035 年
item.description: 印尼淡水河谷公司（PT Vale Indonesia）获得了特别采矿许可证延期，结束了数月来对其未来运营的不确定性。【原文：Nickel miner PT Vale Indonesia received a special mining permit extension that ends months of uncertainty over its future operations.】

item.title: 美国核心 CPI 六个月来首次降温令美联储松了一口气
item.description: 衡量美国基本通胀率的指标在 4 月份出现了六个月来的首次降温，这表明物价压力正在逐步减弱，并支持了美联储在今年晚些时候降息的意图。【原文：A measure of underlying US inflation cooled in April for the first time in six months, indicating price pressures are abating gradually and supporting the Federal Reserve’s intent to cut interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 沙特新矿业公司挑选业内资深人士担任首任首席执行官
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯马纳拉矿产投资公司（Manara Minerals Investment Co.）聘请资深交易员皮埃尔-切纳尔（Pierre Chenard）担任其首位永久首席执行官，这家矿业投资公司正在寻找更多资产。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Manara Minerals Investment Co. hired veteran dealmaker Pierre Chenard to be its first permanent chief executive officer, as the mining investment firm searches for more assets.】

item.title: 欧佩克+关于产量的决定可能将美元置于需求之上
item.description:
分析师称，集团必须在6月1日的会议上增产以平衡市场，但这可能不会成为部长们的首要任务。【原文：

Group must increase production at June 1 meeting to balance the market, analysts say, yet that likely won’t be the top priority for ministers.  

】

item.title: 美国进出口银行审计发现非洲缺乏增长战略
item.description: 根据监察长的一份审计报告，美国进出口银行缺乏明确的非洲发展战略，因为该银行旨在支持的贸易在过去十年中日渐式微。【原文：The US Export-Import Bank has lacked a clear strategy for growth in Africa as trade the lender is meant to support has waned over the last decade, according to an audit by the inspector general.】

item.title: 消息称摩根士丹利将从 Blackstone 风险投资公司购买房地产债务
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，摩根士丹利已达成协议，从包括 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Morgan Stanley struck a deal to buy roughly $700 million of property loans made by the failed Signature Bank from a group including Blackstone Inc., Canada Pension Plan Investment Board and Rialto Capital, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 北欧电力联营交易后，冰岛将拥有首个电力市场
item.description: 冰岛即将建立第一个有组织的电力市场，此举将有助于提高电价的透明度。【原文：Iceland is about to get its first organized power market, a move that will help make rates more transparent.】

item.title: 地缘政治影响市场，桥水公司 40% 的赌注泡汤
item.description: Bridgewater Associates 首席执行官 Nir Bar Dea 警告投资者，在地缘政治紧张局势影响全球市场的情况下，不要对自己的仓位过于自信。【原文：Bridgewater Associates Chief Executive Officer Nir Bar Dea warned investors of becoming too overconfident in their positions as geopolitical tensions impact markets around the world.】

item.title: AMC 利用 Meme 股票交易削减 1.64 亿美元债务
item.description: AMC Entertainment Holdings 正利用其 meme 股票的涨势削减债务，重温 2021 年帮助其增强流动性的一招。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings is taking advantage of its meme stock rally to reduce its debt, revisiting a playbook that helped it shore up liquidity in 2021.】

item.title: 交易员在期权市场加大对欧洲央行大幅降息的押注
item.description: 期权市场上出现了大量押注欧洲央行大幅降息的交易。【原文：A flurry of trades betting on large interest-rate cuts from the European Central Bank is showing up in the options market.】

item.title: 硅谷正在寻找自己的人工智能份额
item.description:
随着 OpenAI 和 Google 宣布新一轮进展，初创企业也在努力寻找自己的定位。【原文：

As OpenAI and Google announce a new round of advances, startups try to figure out where they fit in.

】

item.title: 巴西 Sabesp 公司股价已接近主要收购者的 "极限
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的水务公司 Sabesp 的股票在过去一年中上涨了 50%，这让一家潜在的战略投资者感到有些不安。【原文：A 50% stock rally over the past year at Sabesp, Latin America’s largest water utility, is giving a potential strategic investor some jitters.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。CPI日终于到来，交易员们看涨情绪高涨。与此同时，最新一轮的 "备忘录股票 "狂热仍在继续，铜世界也在酝酿一个大事件。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. CPI day is finally here and traders are in a bullish mood. Meanwhile, the latest round of meme-stock mania continues and a big story is brewing in the world of copper. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 摩根大通杰米-戴蒙呼吁与中国 "全面接触
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）呼吁，尽管中国对西方构成了 "严峻的竞争"，但仍应与中国进行充分和深思熟虑的接触。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon called for full and thoughtful engagement with China, despite the country posing “tough competition” for the West.】

item.title: 卡塔尔称 2030 年后将需要新的全球液化天然气项目
item.description: 卡塔尔能源部长表示，对天然气的需求将持续增长，2030 年之后全球将需要更多的供应项目。【原文：Demand for natural gas will keep growing and more supply projects will be required globally beyond 2030, Qatar’s energy minister said.】

item.title: 必和必拓股东认为盎格鲁集团的出价还有提高的空间
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）和收购目标英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的股东预计，这家全球最大的矿业公司将在下周监管截止日期前提出第三份改进方案，即使这家规模较小的公司周二提出了自己大胆的重组计划。【原文：Shareholders in BHP Group Ltd. and takeover target Anglo American Plc expect the world’s largest miner to come back with a third and improved proposal before a regulatory deadline next week, even after the smaller company laid out a bold restructuring plan of its own on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国联邦银行放弃新建办公室计划，坚持远程办公
item.description: 德国联邦银行放弃了在法兰克福总部增建新办公楼的计划，因为员工可以利用其在家办公的政策。【原文：Germany’s Bundesbank abandoned plans to add new office buildings to its Frankfurt headquarters as employees avail of its policy to work from home.】

item.title: 欧盟农作物贸易数据数周缺失，引发需求问题
item.description: 由于技术问题持续存在，欧盟的谷物出口数据自 3 月下旬以来一直缺失，在小麦价格飙升的同时，也掩盖了需求的步伐。【原文：The European Union’s grains export data has been missing since late March as technical issues persist, obscuring the pace of demand just as wheat prices soar.】

item.title: 欧盟称欧元区软着陆步入正轨但赤字扩大
item.description: 据欧盟委员会称，欧元区经济仍将实现软着陆，通胀回落速度将快于此前预期，经济增长将在明年回升。【原文：The euro-area economy is still headed for a soft landing, with inflation backpedaling more quickly than previously expected and growth picking up through next year, according to the European Commission.】

item.title: 欧盟认为意大利的财政状况比梅洛尼预计的要糟糕得多
item.description: 根据欧盟的预测，意大利明年将面临赤字扩大和债务激增的局面，这与意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府的乐观前景明显不符。【原文：Italy now faces a widening deficit and a jump in debt next year, according to European Union forecasts that conflict markedly with the rosier outlook of Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government.】

item.title: F1 大亨前妻建立家族办公室管理离婚财富
item.description: 一级方程式赛车亿万富翁伯尼-埃克尔斯通（Bernie Ecclestone）的前妻成立了一家公司，管理她从世界上最大的赛车运动品牌之一获得的财富，成为最新一位加强财富控制的超级富婆。【原文：The ex-wife of Formula One billionaire Bernie Ecclestone has built a firm to manage the fortune she derived from one of the world’s biggest motor-sports brands, becoming the latest super-rich woman to take more control of her wealth.】

item.title: 非洲金融公司将为非洲基础设施计划筹资近 10 亿美元
item.description: 非洲金融公司希望在 2024 年上半年筹集近 10 亿美元，用于支持工业和抵御气候变化，为非洲大陆的下一个增长阶段做好准备。【原文：Africa Finance Corp. is looking to raise almost $1 billion in the first half of 2024 to support industries and resilience against climate change as it readies for the next growth phase across the continent.】

item.title: 瑞士软化中立以出口武器，但不会帮助乌克兰
item.description: 瑞士政府希望能够避开本国僵硬的中立立场，允许更多的武器出口，但将继续阻止向乌克兰运送武器。【原文：The Swiss government wants to be able to sidestep the country’s rigid neutrality to allow more arms exports but will keep stopping weapon shipments to Ukraine.】

item.title: 印度贸易赤字因黄金进口支出增加而扩大
item.description: 由于黄金进口支出的增加，印度 4 月份的贸易赤字扩大至四个月来的最高点。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened to a four-month high in April due to a rise in gold import bill.】

item.title: 瑞典央行官员淡化通胀超调担忧
item.description: 瑞典央行官员表示，他们并不担心瑞典的通胀率会低于目标值，此前发布的一系列数据显示，物价上涨的速度比预期的要快。【原文：Riksbank officials signaled that they are not concerned about inflation in Sweden falling below its target after a string of releases showing that price increases are moderating at a faster pace than expected.】

item.title: 爱尔兰银行将停止在英国的企业贷款
item.description: 爱尔兰银行集团公司（Bank of Ireland Group Plc）将关闭其在英国的企业贷款部门，理由有很多，其中包括在英国产生长期可持续回报的能力。【原文：Bank of Ireland Group Plc is to wind down its corporate lending arm in Great Britain, citing a range of reasons, including the ability to generate long-term sustainable returns there.】
